note.p: Death: Farnham House, Finglass, Dublin, Ireland (09 May 1904)
Education: Trinity College, Dublin. BA (1844), LLD
Career: Professor of Mathematics, Queen's College, Galway (1853-1893); wrote 'History of Greek geometry from Thales to Euclid ' (1889); died of pneumonia
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1906-1907 vol 78 pp xii-xiii signed by B W
